name: mixology
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity or skill of mixing drinks such as cocktails (= drinks, usually alcoholic ones, made by mixing other drinks together): We decided to test out the bartenders' mixology skills. If you like a little creative mixology, try adding a shot of green liqueur to your Champagne.
More examplesFewer examplesPassengers will be treated to a "mixology" experience, hosted by bartenders from some of the world's most highly acclaimed bars.The cocktail menu reads like a whistle-stop tour of mixology.I appreciated the mixology involved in that piquant drink.
